We give participant standard pre- post-transplantation management immunosuppressive therapy , three tablet calcium citrate ( Citracal + D , contain 315 mg elemental calcium 200 IU vitamin D ) , multivitamin provide 400 unit vitamin D daily . We randomize participant one two active treatment group within 1 month transplantation . We give Group A active alendronate ( 10 mg/day ) placebo calcitriol . We give Group B placebo alendronate active calcitriol ( 0.25 microgram BID ) . The primary efficacy endpoint change spine bone mineral density ( BMD ) first 6 month transplantation . The secondary efficacy endpoint change hip BMD first year transplantation . We also monitor incidence vertebral fracture . We invite eligible subject participate study .
